text: “Ndipo akakumana ndi amene akhulupirira, amanena: Takhulupirira (kuti uyu, Muhammad (s.a.w) ndi mneneri woona, ndipo watchulidwa m’mabuku athu).” Koma akakhala kwaokha kuseli, amati: “Mukuwauza iwo (Asilamu) zimene Allah anakufotokozerani (m’buku la Taurat) kuti adzakhale ndi mtsutso pa inu kwa Mbuye wanu? Kodi mulibe nzeru
